Name: PINGS AND COMMUNICATIONS
Description:
This section dictates specifically values related to teammate communication (Walkie Talkies not included - that will be in the items section!).

Mainly pings will be here - but any other values that are added in relation to teen communication will be put in this

Misc.ToolTip: The duration a ping stays visible to all other teens.
The max range at which an object can be pinged.
The amount of time one has between clicks for a ping to be considered a cautionary ping.
The minimum cooldown before one can ping again (this does not account for penalties).
The base start time for penalizing ping spam. Must be <= 0 in order for you to be able to ping.
The amount of penalty added to the ping penalty timer per ping.
